title: Location of centralized control, connecting all fire alarms, built- in fire protection arrangements and public address system, etc
clause_text: Location of centralized control, connecting all fire alarms, built- in fire protection arrangements and public address system, etc.; location and dimensions of static water storage tank and pump room along with fire service inlets for mobile pump and water storage tank;
section: Contour plan of site, wherever necessary .
